fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Abilities:
- Roleblock a player. If you successfully stopped an action with this ability, generate one sun. If you stopped an action targetting a Plants member, generate two instead.
- Grant an ally plant permanent roleblock immunity. Costs 1 sun.
- Roleblock one player for every time you've successfully stopped an action and for every time you've negated a roleblock. Costs 2 sun. (One use)
